page.title: 19CHOIR AND CHURCH (CONT)
page.content:
the organ starts playing and we walk to the aisle and bowto the altar. While we are having a church service others are learning about God at {Sunday School,}many children from our school belong to it. In{Sunday School}you can make lots of things. We read out of the bible to improve our kmowledge of the bible. If it is matins at church we stay the whole hour at{Sunday School}but if it is communion we stay about thirty five minutes because we go up to be blessed.
By Sarah B Melanie and Julia
This survey was carried out by the children of St.Andrews School Chedworth.Sarah Cosgrove(9 years)and Ian Goodall(10 years)put it all together and organised the keywords.
